Description: SystemVerilog test module for SQLite DPI functionality.  Provides comprehensive test coverage for SQLite database operations including database management, table operations, transactions, and data manipulation. Serves as a verification suite for the SQLite DPI interface implementation.

test_sqlite
module test_sqlite (
input 
reg 
clk_i
)

SystemVerilog test module for SQLite DPI functionality.  Tests various SQLite operations including database management, table operations, transactions, and data manipulation.

Functions
basic_sqlite_test
function automatic bit basic_sqlite_test(
input 
string 
test_name
)

Basic test for SQLite database operations.  Tests opening and closing a database.

Parameter: test_name

Name of the test for reporting Returns: 1 if test passes, 0 if test fails

function automatic bit open_sqlite_test(
input 
string 
test_name
)

Test for opening SQLite database.  Verifies database handle creation and error handling.

Parameter: test_name

Name of the test for reporting Returns: 1 if test passes, 0 if test fails

get_row_operations_test
function automatic bit get_row_operations_test(
input 
string 
test_name
)

Test for get_row function.  NOTE: This test only verifies successful execution (return code 0), as the current DPI implementation prints data to the console instead of returning it to SystemVerilog.

Parameter: test_name

Name of the test for reporting Returns: 1 if test passes, 0 if test fails

function automatic void end_of_test(
input 
bit 
success,
input 
string 
test_name
)

Helper function to report the result of a test.

Parameter: success

Whether the test succeeded
